actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to restore minimum benefits for future beneficiaries.
short_title: Social Security Minimum Benefit Restoration Act of 1982
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Minimum Benefit Restoration Act of 1982 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to restore the minimum monthly social security benefit with respect to benefits for months after December 1981.

titles.title: Social Security Minimum Benefit Restoration Act of 1982
A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to restore minimum benefits for future beneficiaries.
